Voter consensus: 100% approval. Incorporate these pedagogical elements: - Learning Objectives: [insert full list from above] - Active Learning: Use to inspire higher-order questions (e.g., debate-style analysis). - Scaffolding Layers: [insert full list from above]; tag each card. Strictly follow Flashcard Schema: [insert full schema from above]. Output ONLY a JSON array of 25 flashcards, e.g., [{'front': '...', 'back': {'answer': '...', 'explanation': '...', 'bloom_level': '...', 'scaffolding_layer': '...', 'distractors': [...], 'source': '...'}}, ...]. Ensure variety, active recall, spaced repetition optimization (detailed explanations). Cover prior knowledge links (asymmetric crypto, Ethereum accounts).
